item.title: Streaming AWS S3 objects in AWS EKS cluster
item.description: Java spring-boot microservice to read objects from AWS S3 bucket that can be accessed by other microservices over HTTP I recently came across a requirement to host static content for my microservices running on the AWS EKS cluster. Since there were multiple services that will be accessing different objects so I thought to create a common S3 bucket for hosting and gave S3ReadAccess to my cluster. This saves effort on the microservices end.
